It all started with the Adipose Organisation. You heard of them, right? Yeah, those Youtube guys. The image of fat women strutting their stuff on the internet wasn't anything new, but these guys had some flair to it. They ran multiple series, each focussing on fat women. One had the second in command explaing to us why the round female figure was oh-so much more desirable than a thin one. Others had them showcasing their overweight 'priestesses.' I guess the them was they were an ancient society or something, but it was plainly obvious they were filming it in a poorly lit garage.

Their leader was a girl named Veronica Bliss, or as she caleld herself, Madame Consumer, the Grand Digestor. She weighed around two hundred and eighty pounds, and always declared how that made her a goddess of sorts. She believed that one day she would rise to power and become the reincarnation of Adephagia, Greek Goddess of Gluttony. One of her primary video series was Madame Consumer Consumes, inwhich she would eat something and act like it was an action against the skinny ruled world. It was actually pretty funny until Episode 37, Madame Consumer Consumes: A Cheerleader.

Bad enough half the internet watched her swallow that poor girl whole, but she decided to hold the microphone to her stomach, allowing us all to hear her horrified screams as she was melted into a layer of belly fat. The outcry was enormous and a search for the group was instantly initiated. Despite what we had once believed, they were indeed difficult, maybe even impossible to find. Worse? Her stint got the attention of British Priminister, Gwendolyn Gotblub.

The already corrupt Prime Minister decided to follow Consumer's message and gained hundreds of pounds, eating both food and British citizens alike. However, she managed to keep it under wraps, until she declared war on the United States for trying to keep away it's delicious fattening foods and overweight populace from her. Thankfully, this sparked the Rebellion, and not so thankfully, sent us spiralling into our current state.

Now, the UK has been split into the United Republic, and the Gotblub Empire. Gotblub has managed to conquer a good chunk of Europe, and even Australia; and through extremely devious means, eliminated the worlds nukes. To combat the growing threat, the United Republic formed an Alliance with the United States. After some negotiations, China and Japan have also joined them, forming The Potbelly Alliance.
The Adipose Organisation has ironically fallen from the picture almost completely, the vast majority of soldiers on all sides is female, and somehow, warfare is just as much about growing in size and weight as it is about combat.

Yep, welcome to The Corpulence Conflict. The world will never be the same.

On the upside though, junk food sales has risen to an all time high.

Now, where will we go from here?

But even a relentless glutton such as she has other needs. Gotblub is on a search for her true love, and she'll find them. No matter how many people need to get eaten first.

"Ladies and gentlemen, presenting her royal highness, Empress Gotblub with a special announcement."

The stadium was packed. At least two thousand people filled up the seats, though with all the extra weight, it seemed more like four hundred. They cheered and screamed in joy as the stage curtains began to open, slowly revealing their lord and master, Empress Gotblub. She smiled upon them with a giddy look of joy; she was always giddy from eating a huge meal. Her intense appetite was originally feared to cause famine and poverty within her Empire, but in regards to food it was actually far better off than before.

With a being of such intense gluttony, Gotblub knew she would eat her country's resources before too long.This of course meant that she would have to stop eating once she was finished with them and her subjects, so she put forward a project for her scientists to increase crop and livestock production. Knowing that failure would equal digestion, they wisely decided to work as quickly as possible, and managed to achieve exactly what she asked for. In fact, there was so much extra food lying around, the populace of the Empire were not only able to survive, but bloat themselves with hunger like their ravishing leader. But of course, nobody held a candle to her.

Gotblub was as much into gaining weight as she was eating, and as such, also ordered her scientists to create an powerful weight gain drug for her. Again successful, she had all food cooked and drenched in the drug (Bellyup), and regularly drank it like water. As a result, she weighed about two million pounds and was able to fill up a Air Hangar. She refused to let anyone say her weight in tonnes, she wanted to hear those numbers go higher and higher! At such a size, people began to forget that she was once known for her beautiful black hair and super model looks. She'd have it no other way.

Despite her size and gluttony, she was also still very much interested in a number of things that would appear to be out of the question. For example, she was still thoroughly convinced she needed to wear royal garbs. The amount of fur needed to make her robes was much closer to a massacre than anything else, especially considering how she outgrew them so quickly. In fact, her current outfit was ready to burst at the seams, though due to being designed to show off every ounce of her planetary stomach, this may not have been very noticable.
She also had the Crown Jewels incorporated into her crown, as well as most of the mueseum. While she hadn't taken a step since she consumed her first victim a year or two back, her scientists noted that if she actually tried, she may very well be capable of walking. Of course, she had no interest in the matter.

Finally, after a few moments of getting herself ready, her microphone was in place and she managed to stop admiring her building sized breasts to talk. "My people," she thundered, being such a massive size did many things to fuel her ego, booming voice included, "You all look...delicous today...But do not fret, I promise you that this press conference is not an excuse to get you inside of me. The last one was purely spur of the moment and I had every intention of telling you about our progress. You may recall that recently, we had added the continent of Australia to our list of conquered lands. I am happy to say that their current Prime Minister, Bronson Delfin is digesting rather nicely." The crowd roared as she patted her immense stomach, cause a wave-like jiggle throughout. And by almost, I of course mean that it looked like pink colored water crashing against the beach. "With this new conquest, we shall have an inflush of delicious kangaroo meat, koala burgers and leopard roast!" It should be noted that despite her massive success as an evil dictator, she wasn't particulerly bright at times "But that isn't why I have gathered you here today. No, what I want to talk to you about is my newest plans for a different kind of conquest. I am a goddess, and as such, I require more than just food. I want a husband. All I ask is that it is someone who I can be fond of seeing, who will do all in his power to take care of me, and be able to make love to me without ending up crushed. If I want to dispose of you, I would like to devour you alive! Try outs start tomorrow, remember to be either handsome as hell, or fat and tasty.

Again, this caused teh crowd to roar in excitement. Though for them, it was a bizarre expereince. Though many did believe in the Gotblub Dream, there were just as many who could see her for the monster of society she was. Yet they cheered anyway, perhaps their wills were broken under her rule, or perhaps they just feared her wrath. Whatever the reason, Empress Gotblub had absolute power in her domain, and she so desperaately wanted to spread it as far as possible.

----

"You were magnificent your worship!"

"Thank you Jennifer, it took oh so much effort. Please, order her up another meal. And tell them to octupple up on the Bellyup, I'm beginning to look anorexic!"

Jennifer stood by her Empress as she was carted down her insanley huge palace (previously known as London) by her personal convoy of specially built trucks. Despite being made of the highest quality possible, they continued to creak and groan under her weight. Her workers were certainly not looking forward to sitting her onto her throne. Jennifer was her personal assistant, so to speak. She could possibly be considered the brains of the operation, had Gotblub not had such a tight hold on her. Essentially her job was 'Tell army to conquer more land, keep Empress happy,' and she did it with a certain form of excellence, to the point where she was the only servant that the immense woman even began to consider a friend or worth remembering.

Jennifer herself was fuelled by a bizarre mix of emotions towards her. Jen was originally a popular BBW model for Bigger is Better Magazine's European Branch. After the Corpulence Conflict broke out, she witnessed Gotblub devouring every other model in their employ, and even her own beloved family. For that she should have hated her! But no, somehow the unbridled gluttony and selfishness made her somewhat envious and filled her with uneasy admiration. She refused to commit to either feeling and just did as she was told from then on, eventually developing something resembling a friendship with the gigantic mass of fat calling itself an Empress.

"Have they finished converting the Thames into my bath yet? I feel I'm overdue for a washing that didn't involve so many sponges."

"Actually, production has been halted on that."

"WHAT!? WHY!?"

"Because you also asked them to do something about your...waste. You produce twice as much as the entire Empire combined, so it's getting harder and harder to get rid of it. The fertilizer plan is working, but you make it six times faster than it takes for it to dissolve."

"Oh yes, I can see how that would be of concern. I apologise for snapping at you. To make up for it, you will be able to personall feed me a course of my meal tonight." Due to the sheer amount she consumed, this meant hard labour AND the use of a crane.

"Very well Empress. We don't want you looking too skinny for tomorrow. Big day."

Indeed a big day. Tomorrow would see the Empress find her Emperor. Or possibly, just a meal. She salivated enough for a river at the thought of what tomorrow would bring.

The next few hours were spent feeding the Empress. With the sheer amount of food that disappeared past those enormous lips (Enough to fill a three story house to the bursting point), it was almost impossible to believe that this was not only a small portion, but that there was absolutely no food shortage in the Empire. Though she would usually eat several times this, Gotblub felt too disheartened by her failure to find a husband, though not in a very emotional sense. She was used to getting exactly what she wanted, and right now she wanted a husband!

But perhaps it was also because she was thinking. A very devious mind existed within the walking stomach, one that didn't take no for an answer.

"Jennifer! To me!"

Of course Jennifer was never very far away. Due to her position, she was required to stay very close. For the last few months, she had been treated to a new office and living quarters in front of the Empress's blouse. From a distance, it just looked like a colossal emerald and locket, but closer inspection revealed it's status as a one room house.

"Yes, your highness? What do you desire?"

"My desires have not changed," she boomed, "But I feel that I may have found a solution. It is obvious that my personal subjects are not fit to serve as my other half, this is clearly because I have them all wrapped tightly around my thumb. A suitable man would need more than absolute devotion to me, after all I have that my the country full."

"So, what are you suggesting?"

"The British cannot birth a man good enough for me. They're too soft, they let other people push them around because it is 'polite.' If I am to find a husband, I must look elsewhere."

"You want to leave the kingdom...?"

"Yes! We must look everywhere for my soul mate! Everywhere except France. They're even squishier than the British. Though of course we'll still stop by for a snack. "

"B-But your Highness, that would be extraordinarily dangerous! We use enough power getting you around from one street to the next. If you were to travel outside, you'd be vulnerable!"

"I am well aware of that. If I am to possibly travel to the United States, do you not think I would consider this?"

"The...United States? But you couldn't possibly go there without the Alliance coming down on us in full force."

"Ha! They would need such an effort to rid themselves of me, wouldn't they. I am going to slumber; when I awake, I want to get this ball rolling as quick as possible. I have been alone for too long."

Jennifer watched as her master closed her eyes and began to doze off into a deep sleep. This was bad. What if something happened to Gotblub? She honestly didn't know how to feel about it. What would happen to the world if her reign suddenly ended? In the current state, a slightly smaller successor was quite likely. In general it just wasn't a good idea. No doubt she would still desire to visit unconquered areas of Europe, and going to America? Suicide! Plain and simple.

But despite it all, she knew there was no arguing. The next day there would be preparations for the Empress's travels. What would her immense appetite, or actually...heart tell her to go?

Also like most other soldiers, Tash was overweight. Some considered the hard part to be getting in and out of the country, but she felt the hard part was running out of enemies to beat up. Gotblub didn't train them very well, but she sure had a lot of them.

She spent a lot of time swinging her fists around, knocking out soldier after soldier, and letting loose more brain numbing farts and belches. You see, the combat in the CC had taken some bizarre turns. Nowadays, instead of developing nukes, governments worked towards making supremely obese soldiers to devour the enemy, or food that caused toxic flatulence. Tash was one of these lucky soldiers. Unfortunately her platoon had been wiped out. Being a group of weapons dealers, these people were packing serious heat. "Tonight you die, Potbelly Scum!"

SHNIRKb}"Good night."

"Well at least you got to see some action. I just got about six guys, and three of them were the guys who shot me. Let me tell you right now..."

BLEEP! BLEEP! BLEEP!

"What is that?"

"Shit! The charges! I guess there's at least one guy we didn't get."

"Never mind that, let's get out of here! How long to we have?"

"Two minutes."

"Son of a bitch..."

Instantly, the two soldiers made a run for the door. Leaping out would not be such a problem, had it not been for the fact that the door in question was intended for helicopters due to the compound being on the side of Ayres Rock. Nevertheless, they found themselves leaping through the air as the final ticks went off. Had they been able to turn and see it, the explosion would have been quite satisfying. Rubble and debris flew through the air, surrounding the rising fireball as it thundered into the sky. The noise was deafening for sure, but thankfully the duo were falling just out of range.

Though jumping off of a small mountain was not a partciculerly good idea, their options had been limited. Tash began to ponder a possible escape from the situation. "When did you say transport would be here?"

"I didn't!"

Both of them began to groan. They were going to die on empty stomachs...

"Incoming!" Just meters from the ground, the two chubster commandoes found themselves latching onto the side of a Helicopter, quickly being pulled to safety by a pair of medics. Ah timing, a friend to all human beings. The two continued to groan and cough for a bit as the medics hauled them onto stretchers. Safe distance or not, that explosion definately took it out of them.

"Whoa...Well, that was fun."

"Yeah. Let's do this again some time."

"Sure...By the way...I'm Tash. Tash Forbes."

"Kishi Moto. Nice to meet you."

----

That was about one year ago. Kishi and Tash were now not merely just acquaintences, but quite possibly the best of friends. Togethor they had helped complete seventeen successful missions against the enemy, and were even allowed to share quarters togethor back at their station in the ozzy outback. Though of coruse their missions had taken them out of the country plenty of times. In fact, they were currently reporting to their Commanders office on a matter such as this.

Well, that is to say Tash was. Kishi wasn't anywhere to be seen. It was quite troubling actually, where was she? Tash however was hurriedly making her way. In the time since she met Kishi, her weight had finally gone up. She was now quite the butterball at two hundred and sixty pounds. Kishi hadn't balooned quite as much, merely being three hundred and twenty.

"Where on Earth is she?"

"Hey Tash! Wait up!"

Tash turned to see Kishi charging through the compound towards her...wearing nothing but a towel and dripping wet.

"What the hell are you doing?"

"I slept in! I was in the middle of my shower when I got the news."
